title: Barista Fundamentals 12/11
desc: Are you an aspiring barista looking to enhance skills and expand your knowledge base? A coffee enthusiast wanting to have an immersive sensory experience? Our four-hour intensive is a hands-on introduction to crafting the best beverages, including espresso technique, milk science and cleaning procedures. Expect to leave with an understanding of: -Espresso extraction and preparation -How to create microfoam and reach optimal sweetness with milk -Basic pouring technique -Assembly and execution of popular espresso-based drinks -Efficient bar flow -Daily cleaning procedures of espresso equipment No experience necessary, but get ready to have some edifying and caffeinated fun! This class is the prerequisite for Advanced Espresso and Latte Art & Workflow. Please contact  education@irvingfarm.com  with any questions. *If for any reason you're unable to attend a  scheduled  class please contact  Education@irvingfarm.com  at least 24 hours in advance. Due to limited space and  resources  we will be unable to refund no-shows or sudden  cancellations  and a $50 surcharge will be billed to wholesale customers.
